span.span: The Longwood Central School District's mission is to provide our citizenry with a quality educational program that includes opportunities for educational growth, self-awareness and the skills necessary to pursue a meaningful and rewarding future.

p.style: font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 6px; margin-left: 0px; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal;

span.style: font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: medium; font-family: Tahoma, Verdana, Arial, Helvetica;

span.span:
Click here for coronavirus informational updates.
Distance Learning
------------------------------------------------
The NYSED has announced that all 2020 federal standardized testing requirements have been eliminated.
The deadline for nonpublic transportation is extended to April 15, 2020. Private and parochial applications for the 2020-21 school year can be sent to transportation@longwoodcsd.org.

p.style: font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 6px; margin-left: 0px; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal;

span.span: Executive Order 202.13 delays school district elections until a date in June, reserving for future action the adjourned election date and voting methodology. The circulation, filing, and collection of nominating petitions has been postponed. The community will be notified when new dates are established.

a.style: display:inline-block; padding:5px 10px; color: white; background: #0C4421; float: right;

div.div: The Board of Education of the Longwood Central School District has a scheduled Board Meeting on Thursday, April 23, 2020 at 7:00 p.m.
div.a: Read More about Board of Education Notice

div.div: Residents are invited to our School/Community Forum to elicit feedback and input from our community prior to the Board adopting its school budget in April.
div.a: Read More about School and Community Forum - CANCELED

div.div: Welcome Class of 2033! Online kindergarten registration is open.
